eecs.editor.language
Interface LanguageKit

public interface LanguageKit

An interface to manage how languages are handled in the editor. By implementing this interface, languages can be registered in the editor and get support from compiling, formatting, and running/viewing.

Author:
Karl A. Gossett

getCompilerPercentComplete

public int getCompilerPercentComplete()
Gets the status of the compiler as a percentage complete (0-100, integers). If there is nothing to compile, or it is finished, this will return 100 (representing 100% complete).

Returns:
The percent of checking complete, as an int 0-100.

getRunResults

public String getRunResults()
Returns any output or messages produced when the program is run. Should return a null if the language does not support execution, or the program has not been executed. Expected behavior is that if a program was executed with the run(java.io.File) command then this method will not return until results are available.

Returns:
a String containing the results, or null if this language doesn't support execution. Should return an empty String if there is no output (as opposed to null).
